headline: PepsiCo Leverages Salesforce's Agentforce to Advance AI Agenda
summary: PepsiCo (NASDAQ: PEP) today announced plans to deploy Agentforce — the digital labor platform from Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) for bringing trusted, autonomous AI agents into the flow of work. Through this expanded collaboration with Salesforce, the world's #1 AI CRM, PepsiCo will leverage AI agents to manage key functions, enhancing customer support and operational efficiency, while empowering sales teams to focus on strategic growth and deeper engagement with retailers.
